projects.title: portfolio
projects.description: you're looking at it now! features a dynamically generated background graphic inspired by the ground plan of hadrian's villa.

projects.title: where's bosch?
projects.description: 'where's waldo?'-type web game built with react and firebase. the project features the 'garden of earthly delights' by early netherlandish artist hieronymus bosch.

projects.title: ArtCart
projects.description: a demo online store featuring shopping cart functionality, a searchable catalog, dynamic page routing, and a tongue-in-cheek contemporary art market theme.

projects.title: campaign website
projects.description: real informational website for a local political candidate, built from scratch using vanilla js and custom css.

projects.title: brassicaDB
projects.description: a fully searchable and editable vegetable-themed inventory site created with several back-end technologies.

projects.title: now // later
projects.description: a streamlined to-do list web app with a clean, warm design inspired by the aesthetic of architect frank lloyd wright.

projects.title: graces
projects.description: simple informational website for my own seasonal food business, built with react with an eye toward ease of maintenance.

projects.title: lead block sports
projects.description: real, actively maintained sports blog website built entirely with vanilla js and custom css; this project will soon be refactored & expanded.

projects.title: battlesquares
projects.description: 'battleship'-inspired web game demonstrating key concepts of OOP and test-driven development.

projects.title: memory game
projects.description: simple react-based memory card game highlighting component state and lifecycle methods.

projects.title: cv generator
projects.description: single-page react app for generating a fully formatted resume with user-chosen fonts and accent colors.

projects.title: how's the weather?
projects.description: weather app powered by data from a third-party API; the gentle, airy aesthetic features paintings by j.m.w. turner.

projects.title: apicius cafe
projects.description: informational website for an imaginary restaurant featuring dynamic, event-driven DOM manipulation and a highly elaborated ancient rome-inspired theme.

projects.title: admin dashboard
projects.description: design concept for an imaginary admin dashboard page, laid out primarily using css grid.

projects.title: tic-tac-toe
projects.description: simple tic-tac-toe web game with a striking visual design - an early experiment in crafting a dynamic and unconventional user experience.

projects.title: book log
projects.description: web app to log a user's reading activity and annual reading goal.

projects.title: contact form
projects.description: contact form for an imaginary restaurant, developed as an exercise in form design and client-side form validation.

projects.title: pointillist etch-a-sketch
projects.description: early javascript project using an art historical etch-a-sketch concept to explore event-driven DOM manipulation.

projects.title: calculator
projects.description: another early javascript project - a fully functional digital calculator with an experimental visual design.
